title: FINALLY got gold

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=TrueRedemption,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Afp5BwKk,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-22T08:55:27.068+0000)
>
> oh man, what can i say. what a ride. Starting in Bronze and worked my way up all the way to gold. met some great people, and some bad. acknowledged defeat when it was due and accepted that i AM NOT the best in the world. i would just like to take some time to say thank you riot for this beautiful game.
> 1 more thing...DONT CHANGE{{champion:133}} 
> ty

Good job getting gold. But unfortunately they did change :)

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Afp5BwKk,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-22T10:09:28.097+0000)
>
> Gold is still essentially bronze.

Says the guy with his bronze plus icon..

> [{quoted}](name=ThatsBS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Afp5BwKk,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-07-23T06:40:48.611+0000)
>
> Says the guy with his bronze plus icon..

Hm? I'm not even ranked.

Getting gold is an achievement now?

2011 called.
I still feel bad about being in bronze

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Afp5BwKk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-22T09:03:04.853+0000)
>
> I still feel bad about being in bronze

bronze is fun though
